title: Summer Reading Starter Kit: Young Adult Novels
description: Whether you're a longtime fan or just thinking about how and where to get started in YA, we've got you covered with some recommendations, some thoughts about what YA is and is not, and some things to look for as you wade into the inviting but turbulent waters of Young Adult fiction.

itunes:title: Summer Reading Starter Kit: Young Adult Novels
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: Not sure what counts as YA and what doesn't? Here's a quick guide to the genre, complete with some reading recommendations.
itunes:subtitle: Not sure what counts as YA and what doesn't? Here's a quick guide to the genre, complete with some reading recommendations.
